items.title: Quick Take - What will the collaboration with UBS mean for 360 ONE?
items.description: The deal will make 360 ONE an invincible player in India’s wealth management industry

items.title: International Gemmological Institute (India): Dimming growth prospects
items.description: The 10 percent import tariff by the US is likely to increase costs and have an adverse effect on discretionary demand.

items.title: Telecom gear maker Mavenir slashes jobs in India in global recast and missed 4G/5G contracts
items.description: The layoffs are part of a broader global restructuring effort to align with shifting market dynamics and optimising operations. Sources told Moneycontrol that the job cuts are primarily affecting employees in the radio and RAN engineering departments, mirroring similar reductions seen in the US.

items.title: Laurus Labs bets on cell and gene therapies, eyes CDMO role
items.description: Laurus aims to leverage India's manufacturing prowess to serve global cell and gene therapy players targeting the Indian market, CEO Satyanarayana Chava has said

items.title: Air India SATS launches logistics park at Bengaluru airport
items.description: Developed with an investment of Rs 200 crore, the facility spans 8 acres and is among the largest on-airport logistics parks in South India.

items.title: Why this renewable energy stock deserves a serious look
items.description: Project pipeline, access to capital, and other factors should help in long-term value creation

items.title: FM Sitharaman interacts with pension fund managers, tech leaders in US; seeks collaboration on AI front
items.description: During the meeting, Sitharaman spoke about the opportunity for investment and collaboration in the domain of energy and sustainability

items.title: Govt looks to triple clearances for pumped hydro storage projects this fiscal
items.description: The government is focusing on pumped storage projects (PSPs) as a long-term solution for storing electricity since the use of batteries for longer hours remains unaffordable
